metadata.title: CVE-2024-35806 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: soc:fsl: qbman: Always disable interrupts when taking cgr_locksmp_call_function_single disables IRQs when executing the callback. Toprevent deadlocks, we must disable IRQs when taking cgr_lock elsewhere.This is already done by qman_update_cgr and qman_delete_cgr; fix the otherlockers.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
